Yuck, Minecraft sucks, who plays that crap?






Except for Minecraft, i do not play much video games currently, i do sometimes get addicted to a game and never stop playing it, these are some games i have gotten addicted to before:

Any Pokemon Game

Portal 2
Fire Emblem
Madden
Fifa
Thats all i can think of right now
